nodes.text: Galactic Gathering 2008 was a poster made during the Galactic Civil War. It depicted an IG-series assassin droid, some aliens, as well as a fleet encompassing two different ships and two X-wing starfighters, with the words "Galactic Gathering 2008" on it.
The poster was given out to players who logged in to the 2008 summit. It was recently changed to become a tradeable item from a shared no trade item.
